name: Reap or Treat
description:
This game was made in 6 hours for Friday Night Game Jam #44 based on the randomly generated theme: "Trick or treat but you're the monster"

LEFT CLICK - Reap

RIGHT CLICK & HOLD - Open basket / Collect candy (while near person)

A / D - Move (while basket is closed) / Move basket (While basket is open)

Collect candy and heads before the night is over. Your final score is equal to your heads multiplied by your candy.

Post your high score in the comments!
